headline: J.B. Hunt taps Brad Delco as next CFO
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services promotes Brad Delco to chief financial officer. The post J.B. Hunt taps Brad Delco as next CFO appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: J.B. Hunt taps Brad Delco as next CFO
raw.summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services promotes Brad Delco to chief financial officer. The post J.B. Hunt taps Brad Delco as next CFO appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: J.B. Hunt Announces Brad Delco as Chief Financial Officer
summary: LOWELL, Ark., August 21, 2025--J.B. Hunt has announced Brad Delco, Senior Vice President of Finance, has been named Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President of Finance.

raw.headline: J.B. Hunt Announces Brad Delco as Chief Financial Officer
